alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 25 at 7:35PM AKDT until October 26 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow, strong winds and local blizzard conditions occuring. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 9 inches. Winds gusting to 50 mph. Visibility on quarter mile or less at times. * WHERE...Yukon Delta. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow is causing blizzard conditions with very low visibility along the coast. Snow is falling inland but winds are not as strong and visibility is not as low. Snow is mixing with rain and sleet this evening from Marshall south.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
